column1: authors:  Allen J. Beck, Ph.D. and Christopher J. Mumola
Table 16.  Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under State jurisdiction,
by offense, gender, race, and Hispanic origin, 1997
Note: Data are for inmates with a sentence of more than 1 year under the jurisdiction of State correctional
authorities.  The number of inmates by offense were estimated using the 1997 Survey of Inmates in State
Correctional Facilities and rounded to the nearest 100.
b/Includes weapons, drunk driving, court offenses, commercialized vice, morals and decency charges,
liquor law violations, and other public-order offenses.
c/Includes juvenile offenses and unspecified felonies.
